Source.Name: qdriverstation
Source.Summary: The QDriverStation is a cross-platform and open-source alternative to the FRC Driver Station
Source.Description: The QDriverStation is a cross-platform and open-source alternative to the FRC Driver Station. It allows you to operate FRC robots with the major operating systems (Windows, Mac OSX and GNU/Linux). The QDriverStation is able to operate both 2009-2014 robots and 2015-2016 robots.

Package.Name: qdriverstation
Package.Summary: The QDriverStation is a cross-platform and open-source alternative to the FRC Driver Station
Package.Description: The QDriverStation is a cross-platform and open-source alternative to the FRC Driver Station. It allows you to operate FRC robots with the major operating systems (Windows, Mac OSX and GNU/Linux). The QDriverStation is able to operate both 2009-2014 robots and 2015-2016 robots.
